field.note: Comma separated list of attributes to be allowed in the Get Lead API. Leave blank to allow all attributes to be returned.

By default lead data is cached for entire session or until a Sync Lead action is triggered. If shorter exiry is desired, specify number of seconds to expire here. Negative number means default caching behavior is used.

Optional. Specify a global keyword to be evaluated to source a trusted email as lead key to get lead from Marketo. It's only required if Marketo Cookie and verified email is not available. e.g %globals_user_attribute_email%
Comma separated list of attributes to be allowed in the Sync Lead API. Leave blank to allow all attributes to be synced.
Marketo automatically merges leads by Email attribute in sync data. It could be a secrity risk if we use unverified Email provided by public user.
Optional. Specify a global keyword to be evaluated as a trusted Email attribute to be synced to Marketo. e.g %globals_user_attribute_email%

section.name: Munchkin API Settings

field.note: Use keyword %globals_marketo_munchkin_id:xx% to print this id.
Specify a global keyword to be evaluated to source a trusted Email in addition to verified Email. e.g %globals_user_attribute_email%.
Use keyword %globals_marketo_munchkin_init:123% to print this init code, where 123 is the asset id of the bridge. %munchkin_account_id% in the code will be replaced with actual Munchkin Account ID.

section.note: Munchkin API requires both Email and Private Key to be set above so that Matrix can generate a hash value to be used in Munchkin API call. Use keyword %globals_marketo_munchkin_hash:xx%
